description: A town in the East Blue that has been taken over by the Buggy Pirates, leaving it mostly deserted except for the mayor Boodle and his dog Chouchou.

keyEvents.title: Zoro vs Cabaji Battle Concludes
keyEvents.description: The duel between Zoro and Cabaji reaches its climax in Orange Town, with Zoro emerging victorious using Oni Giri.
keyEvents.significance: Major battle that helps liberate Orange Town from Buggy Pirates' control.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Buggy Intensifies
keyEvents.description: The battle between Luffy and Buggy reaches a critical point after Buggy damages Luffy's straw hat.
keyEvents.significance: The final confrontation that will determine Orange Town's fate.

statusHistory.reason: Liberation in progress as Straw Hats defeat Buggy Pirates

description: A pub in Orange Town where Buggy stored some of his treasure, including a map of the Grand Line that Nami steals.

keyEvents.title: Nami Steals the Grand Line Map
keyEvents.description: Nami infiltrates the pub and steals a valuable map of the Grand Line from Buggy's treasure chest.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Nami's thieving skills and her interest in maps and treasure.

statusHistory.reason: Being used by Buggy Pirates to store treasure
